thread.title: Bea Sibala
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Bea Sibala

author: Bea Sibala
title: Bea Sibala
text:
The 80% discount site is definitely real. After researching about the different options to get Kayla's workouts, I stumbled upon the discount link for her e-books and it was legit. After purchasing, I immediately received the download links for the ebooks/pdfs and I now have the BBG 1.0, BBG 2.0, and the Bikini Body HELP (nutrition guide) for only $39.97. Very easy download process, and I can access the e-books conveniently on my iPhone!
Can't wait to get started! Thanks so much Kayla! Ready to be a BBG!
